text: We'll soon be forming new digital product teams at British Gas as we extend our platform out to the wider enterprise.  We will be looking for senior ember/js devs to work on those teams. The roles are not out yet but you heard it here first!
So ping me if you are interested

Hi everyone, I’m a senior ember and ruby developer looking for contracting positions in London. I also have experience with Elixir in production and I’d love to work more with it. I prefer to work remotely but I’m happy to mix it with days at any office in central London. Ping me if you are interested!
